680790.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deities of the Haunted Highlands (Castles & Crusades)
680790.description:
Deities of the Haunted Highlands
A Castles & Crusades Library module for Fantasy Grounds
Castles & Crusades Quick Start Rules (Free)
Chapter 4: The Deities of the Karboskian Highlands! A supplement designed for use
with Dirty Bowbe's and any Castles & Crusades Role playing game.
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Castles
& Crusades ruleset.
Conversion by: Alan Neilson
The reproduction of material from within this product for the purposes of personal
or corporate profit, by file, photographic, optical, electronic, or other media
or methods of storage and retrieval, is prohibited.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Alan Neilson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Castles & Crusades ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
